section.name: maven-scala-plugin
section.p: The maven-scala-plugin is used for compiling/testing/running/documenting scala code in maven. The plugin is used by /Lift/.
If there are problems please let us know.

body.p: Thanks to Brice Lambi and the team of the version 1.0 of the plugin. (version 2.x is a 95%/full rewrite)
